events.name: For a nondeterministic Turing machine, the recognised language is those words which admit at least one accepting computation.
A language is in NP if there is a nondeterministic Turing machine such that:
(a) the machine recognises the language, but also:
(b) there is a polynomial p such that for every word, if there is an accepting computation, then there is one with time < p(length of the word)
